item.title: DJ Marc deVasconcelos Podcast 2
item.itunes:author: DJ Marc deVasconcelos
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast 2 - Soulful House
item.itunes:summary: I left my power supply in SF, so I couldn't make a mix of some new house that I just got. But I had a stack of great records staring at me so I recorded the podcast with these in stead. Enjoy! marc@marcSF.com myspace.com/TheDjFromLastNight www.marcSF.com
item.itunes:keywords: Hip Hop, DJ, Mixes, San Francisco, DJ Marc deVasconcelos, House, Rock, Mashup, Mash up, 2nd Sunday, www.marcSF.com, marcSF.com

item.title: DJ Marc deVasconcelos Podcast 1
item.itunes:author: DJ Marc deVasconcelos
item.itunes:subtitle: Podcast 1 - Hip-Hop and Rock
item.itunes:summary: A quick Hip Hop mix for the first podcast! Let me know what you think marc@marcSF.com or myspace.com/TheDjFromLastNight
item.itunes:keywords: Hip Hop, DJ, Mixes, San Francisco, DJ Marc deVasconcelos, House, Rock, Mashup, Mash up, 2nd Sunday, www.marcSF.com, marcSF.com
